title: St. Louis Chiropractor | Top Chiropractors in St. Louis, MO
description: CareSTL Health is proud to collaborate with our partner, Logan University to provide free chiropractor services to our patients. Chiropractic care is a holistic approach to pain management that focuses on mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system and foregoes the use of medication or surgery.
cleaned_text: Chiropractic Services [Logan University](http://www.logan.edu/)to provide free chiropractic services to our patients. Chiropractic care is a holistic approach to pain management that focuses on mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system and foregoes the use of medication or surgery. Common patient complaints include neck and back pain, carpal tunnel syndrome, headaches, fibromyalgia, osteoarthritis, disc/sciatica issues and joint pain. Chiropractic Services CareSTL Health is proud to collaborate with our partner, [Logan University](http://www.logan.edu/) to provide free chiropractic services to our patients. Chiropractic care is a holistic approach to pain management that focuses on mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system and foregoes the use of medication or surgery. Common patient complaints include neck and back pain, carpal tunnel syndrome, headaches, fibromyalgia, osteoarthritis, disc/sciatica issues and joint pain. Chiropractic services are available at two CareSTL Health Offices: [Dr. Martin Luther King Dr.](https://carestlhealth.org/locations/dr-martin-luther-king-drive/) 5471 Dr. Martin Luther
